Name: Sheltering With You
About the game: Genres: Visual novel, ADV, fantasy, romance, yuri, comedy, drama. Description: A difficult journey to the East awaits Helena, an orphan, and Aya, a former brothel worker. At the same time, a certain Monster attacks the villages, and Helena sees strange dreams. On the way, the girls meet a daughter of the northern lord, Liana, who is forced to hide under a wing of a flower seller and be under the strict supervision of her companion Rahl. Will Helena agree to join their company, or will she continue her adventure with Aya? What kind of unusual life stories do the main characters keep in their hearts? Will Helena respond to the call of her dreams, or will she find happiness in big love? It all depends on the player! Features: • 2 possible love interests; • 11 various endings; • many locations; • colorful illustrations; • romantic/erotic scenes. About the characters:
